title: NpcDialoguePacket
description: Sent from the server to client when remote firing an NPC dialogue window for a client

Action JSON.description: The JSON string of the buttons/actions the server can perform. The server is still authoritative on what actions can be performed
Action JSON.x-runtime-constraint-description: Check that there are no more actions than the maximum allowed, and that they are all valid.

Dialogue.description: The text to be displayed to the client

Npc Id Raw Id.description: The ActorUniqueID of the NPC being remote fired

Npc Name.description: The name of the NPC to be displayed to the client

Scene Name.description: The scene the data has been pulled from for the client to reference
